nodes.text: Gray Thirteen was the call sign used by New Republic officer Atril Tabanne during Wraith Squadron's mission to the planet Storinal. Tabanne and Wraith pilot Garik Loran were supposed to commandeer two TIE Fighters at the Revos Spaceport, but when the TIE's were destroyed by Wraiths Wedge Antilles and Falynn Sandskimmer, Tabanne and Loran were picked up by Wraith Squadron's shuttle Narra instead.
